data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the county of Dadra and Nagar Haveli to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dadra and Nagar Haveli, Dadra and Nagar Haveli, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Dadra and Nagar Haveli, Dadra and Nagar Haveli, India that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 691 believers living in the county of Dadra and Nagar Haveli. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Dadra and Nagar Haveli, Dadra and Nagar Haveli, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Āmli
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Āmli, Dadra and Nagar Haveli, India.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Dadra and Nagar Haveli, Dadra and Nagar Haveli, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, help 12 new simple churches start among the 62,800 people in the county of Dadra and Nagar Haveli, Dadra and Nagar Haveli, India. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.focus_label: Dadra and Nagar Haveli, Dadra and Nagar Haveli, India

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Dadra and Nagar Haveli, Dadra and Nagar Haveli, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.
